title: Bug 104339[SPM]JDBC driver jar hasn't been copied to viewer package when add a new driver jar file through Manage Driver
description: Bug 104339[SPM]JDBC driver jar hasn't been copied to viewer package when add a new driver jar file through Manage Driver
OB: Redhat Linux WS3.0Description:JDBC driver jar hasn't been copied to viewer package when add a new driver jarfile through Manage DriverSteps to reproduce:1.Click Manage Driver2.Add a new driverExpected result:The new jar file is copied to jdbc package and viewer packageActual result:It was copied to jdbc package but not to viewer package
